intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are looking to optimize their budget or compare insurance options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's expertise in financial planning to provide unique cost-saving strategies.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and examples.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to decode complex insurance jargon to make informed decisions.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel overwhelmed by technical terms in insurance policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Simplify insurance concepts using ING's trusted voice and clear communication.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to prevent common errors that could cost them money or coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or have had bad experiences in the past.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's customer-centric approach to avoid pitfalls.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to compare and select the best insurance plan for their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are actively considering purchasing insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's digital tools for personalized insurance recommendations.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can position itself as a trusted advisor by offering clear, actionable, and customer-focused content.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive resource hub with guides, glossaries, and cost-saving tips.

intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's digital tools and European expertise to simplify the decision-making process.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop interactive tools and comparison content to help users make informed choices.

Develop a glossary for insurance terminology.
